@AmericanAir I understand that you are not legally bound to give compensation or voucher but I would hope that as a kind gesture to a frequent traveler, you might reconsider. Iâ€™m not trying to sound greedy, even a $200 voucher - nothing to an airline but a lot to me - would be appreciated.
